About Our Project

From Sabeel, Shea, and Chelsea

The problem

The problem we aim to address is the challenge of finding and adopting pets from animal shelters and rescue organizations. Many people who want to adopt pets face difficulties in discovering available animals. The last thing we want, is to prevent an animal from finding a home, because the adoption process is to much of a hassle.

Our Goal

Our goal is for this webpage to be an easy way to find availabe animals at shelters and rescue organizations from wherever you are. This is a user friendly platform that can streamline the adoption process. With a resource like this we can only expect to get more loving pets into loving homes.

How our webpage works

In moments users can type in some basic information including location, type of pet, and distance to instantly get details on animals that could be right for them. Upon searching, users will get results with all available pets in the area that have matched the seach criteria. There will also be a short description of the animal as well as their name and an image.
